description: This Dart class defines constants and SQL related to the 'notes' database table schema, including schema details and a method to generate the table creation SQL statement.

classes.name: NotesSchema
classes.description: Contains schema constants and SQL for the notes table, facilitating database creation and version management.

methods.name: createTableSql
methods.description: Generates the SQL statement string to create the 'notes' table with specified columns and constraints.
